title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: Bug 42225: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace.
OB: When trying to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace via the keybinding manager, it thinks the key combination is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word. Additionally, when trying to reassign the key via the key preference page, Ctrl+Del is displayed instead of Ctrl+Backspace. This issue occurs when using a Swiss German Keyboard with Swiss German Locale.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the keybinding manager.
2. Attempt to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace.
3. Notice that the keybinding manager interprets the key combination as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.

Alternatively:
1. Open the key preference page.
2. Try to reassign the key.
3. Observe that Ctrl+Del is displayed instead of Ctrl+Backspace.
